How to use:

1. Download the sourcefiles.

Include Main.js and also main.scss in your index.html. All the SCSS is written in basic CSS so you don't need to compile it down you can just change the filetype.

2. Create a div and add the class "hexGrid" to it.

It's that simple.

3. renderGrid('layout', rows, columns)

Arguments:
layout(string)- 'Circular' or 'Standard'
rows(number)
columns(disabled for Circular grid - number)
